name: Keep Me in Memory
description:
An infinite side-scroller platformer game where you collect jewels to earn points!

  • Sapphires: 1pt
  • Emeralds: 5pts
  • Rubies: 15pts
  • Diamonds: 25pts

If your character is pushed back (even the smallest push from hitting the edge of a platform), it's Game Over!

ATTRIBUTIONS

"Minimal Sidescroller Tile Set" and "Minimal Sidescroller Tile Set EXPANSION" by Busch on OpenGameArt.org || https://opengameart.org/users/buch

"Gem Icons" by Clint Bellanger on OpenGameArt.org || https://opengameart.org/content/gem-icons

"Cat Sprites" by Shepardskin || https://twitter.com/Shepardskin

MUSIC: "Gone" and "Waving Goodbye" by Ketsa on FreeMusicArchive.org  || http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Ketsa/

***********

This game is currently still in development so there may be some formatting issues. New stages and plot will be implemented at a later point in time.

If your game is having issues playing, please try opening on a different browser.
